text: Abdullah Hadhereti (; born 10 August 1992) is a Saudi Arabian footballer who plays as a forward for Al-Taqadom . ==Career== Hadhereti began his career at the youth team of Al-Raed and left the Club and joined fellow Olympic team Al- Shabab on January 31, 2013 . left Al-Shabab and signed with Al-Raed on August 13, 2014 . left Al-Raed and signed with Damac on September 3, 2015 left Damac and signed with Sdoos on January 1, 2016 . left Sdoos and signed with Al-Ain on August 8, 2017 . left Al-Ain and signed with Al-Taqadom on August 24, 2018 left Al-Taqadom and signed with Al-Qadsiah on loan for the 2019–20 season on January 12, 2020 . ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Saudi Arabia youth international footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Al-Raed FC players Category:Al-Shabab FC (Riyadh) players Category:Damac FC players Category:Sdoos Club players Category:Al-Ain FC (Saudi Arabia) players Category:Al-Taqadom FC players Category:Al-Qadsiah FC players Category:Saudi Professional League players Category:Prince Mohammad bin Salman League players Category:Saudi Second Division players
title: Abdullah Hadhereti
